l:dependency.name: CloudBees VMWare Autoscaling Plugin
l:dependency.l:description: This plugin lets you rent machines from VMWare vSphere installations to use as slaves. These machines act as "private cloud" for Jenkins to allocate jobs. The plugin recoganizes statically or dynamically (drop machines into folders) added machines. This results in an efficient usage of machines across an organization.

l:dependency.name: VMware VI (vSphere) Java API
l:dependency.l:description: Java API for accessing VMWare web services API
